Name: Scattering Shot
Desc: Scatters arrows in every direction and attack enemies within a wide range.

H.Old:
Consumes 35 MP, fires 5 arrows attacking at 120% Damage 4 times. An arrow can attack up to 2 enemies. Increases Damage on Normal monsters by 30%.
When an enemy takes damage from multiple arrows at the same time, final damage from the 2nd arrow decreases by 50%.
One Scattering Shot Cartridge is prepared every 6 sec and up to 3 Cartridges can be obtained.
H.New:
MP Cost: 35. Fires 5 arrows that attack at 120% Damage 4 times. Each arrow attacks up to 2 enemies. Normal Monster Damage +30%.
If a single enemy is hit by multiple arrows, Final Damage -50% for each subsequent arrow after the first one.
1 Scattering Shot Cartridge is ready every 6 sec., and up to 3 can be carried.
